title: Projects
description: Check out some of the projects I've worked at.

list.name: Super DASChecker
list.description: Management and analysis system for tax auditing companies, with solutions for automating services and generating digital contracts.

list.name: iONO App
list.description: White-label solution for car insurance companies with a management system and application for auto-subscription, controlling and referring clients.

list.name: Sagittarius ERP
list.description: Mobile-oriented ERP for retailers with high employee turnover, ease of use and training are its differentials.

list.name: S2 Photobook
list.description: Public real-time photo album for social events like weddings and birthdays.

list.name: S2N NFSe
list.description: Microservice for issuing invoices throughout the Brazilian territory.

list.name: Simple PIX
list.description: Library for generating the brazilian PIX Copy/Paste and QR Code.

list.name: Minha Palestra
list.description: Complete PWA system for managing academic lectures, with participant management, photo viewing and certificate issuance.
